function NPC_8896003:Init( NPCID ) --[[ User Data 1: GlobalPain 2: Horn --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 2 );
NPC_8896003.IdxHorn = 1 NPC_8896003.IdxLeftAnkle = 2 NPC_8896003.IdxRightAnkle = 3
NPC_8896003.TALENT_LeftStep_Slow = 210100013 NPC_8896003.TALENT_LeftStep_Fast = 210100014 NPC_8896003.TALENT_RightStep_Slow = 210100015 NPC_8896003.TALENT_RightStep_Fast = 210100016
NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain1 = 210100001 NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain2 = 210100002
NPC_8896003.TALENT_Punch1 = 210100019 NPC_8896003.TALENT_Punch2 = 210100021
NPC_8896003.LimitForPain = 1000 NPC_8896003.LimitForBreakHorn = NPC_8896003.MaxHP/20 end
function NPC_8896003:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 2 do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
function NPC_8896003:LeftStep( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_8896003.IdxLeftAnkle) then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_8896003.TALENT_LeftStep_Fast, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_8896003.TALENT_LeftStep_Slow, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_8896003:RightStep( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_8896003.IdxRightAnkle) then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_8896003.TALENT_RightStep_Fast, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_8896003.TALENT_RightStep_Slow, Enemy ) end end
-- Talent Callback Func function NPC_8896003:OnFinishAndAggroFar( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "far", 0 ) end
function NPC_8896003:OnFinishAndAggroShort( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_8896003:AccDamageForLeftFoot( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) local PainPoint = GetPainPoint( HitInfo ) if PainPoint > 0 and ( ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() ) < 0.7 and ( not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain1 ) ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(2, HitInfo.Attacker)
return true end
return false end
function NPC_8896003:AccDamageForRightFoot( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) local PainPoint = GetPainPoint( HitInfo )
if PainPoint > 0 and (ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() ) < 0.4 and ( not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain1 ) ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(3, HitInfo.Attacker)
return true end
return false end
function NPC_8896003:AccDamageForHorn( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) --GLog( "NPC_8896003:AccDamageForHorn\n" )
local PainPoint = GetPainPoint( HitInfo )
local AccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(2) + HitInfo.Damage if PainPoint > 0 and AccDamage >= NPC_8896003.LimitForBreakHorn and ( not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain1 ) ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 )
return true else ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, AccDamage ) end
return false end
function NPC_8896003:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) --GLog( "NPC_8896003:AccDamageForPain\n" ) local PainPoint = GetPainPoint( HitInfo )
if PainPoint < 0 then return end
local AccPainPoint = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) + PainPoint if AccPainPoint > NPC_8896003.LimitForPain and ( not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain2 ) ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8896003.TALENT_Pain2 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, 0 ) else ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, AccPainPoint ) end end
--[[ Hit Index 1: left foot 2: right foot 3: head 4: body --]]
function NPC_8896003:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo) -- 오른발을 계속 때리면 오른쪽 족쇄가 왼발을 때리면 왼발족쇄가 부숴진다 --GLog( "NPC_8896003:AccDamage\n" ) if HitIdx == 1 and (not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_8896003.IdxLeftAnkle)) then -- 왼발 if not NPC_8896003:AccDamageForLeftFoot( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) then NPC_8896003:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) end elseif HitIdx == 2 and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_8896003.IdxRightAnkle) then -- 오른발 if not NPC_8896003:AccDamageForRightFoot( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) then NPC_8896003:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) end elseif HitIdx == 3 and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_8896003.IdxHorn) then -- 머리 if not NPC_8896003:AccDamageForHorn( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) then NPC_8896003:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) end else NPC_8896003:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitIdx, HitInfo ) end
return HitInfo end
